TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HeaderedContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 提供所有控制項的簡單實作，其中包含單一內容及標頭。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承屬性從並定義屬性型別的。 inherits the property from and defines the property that is of type . 提供控制項的標題。 provides a heading for the control. 像屬性、可以是任何類型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 下圖顯示兩個物件，繼承自。The following illustration shows two objects, which inherit from . 第一個具有兩者中的內容物件和:設為包含和;設為包含和。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二個設定為字串而設為單一。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") TabControl 中的標頭屬性的不同型別TabControl with different types in the Header property A有限的預設樣式。A has a limited default style. 應用程式開發人員可以建立，但其外觀可能會非常簡單。An application developer can create a , but its appearance will be very simple. 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新。If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . A適用於建立自訂控制項，因為它提供單一標頭的內容控制項的模型。A is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers. 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立< 備註 > 一節所示。The following example shows how to create the shown in the Remarks section. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下列範例顯示如何建立如。The following examples show how to create a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像屬性、可以是任何類型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 使用相同的邏輯來顯示所述。The uses the same logic to display the that is described in . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含兩個物件，繼承自。The following example creates a that contains two objects, which inherit from . 第一個具有兩者中的內容物件和:設為包含和;設為包含和。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二個設定為字串而設為單一。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下圖顯示先前範例所建立。The following illustration shows the created by the previous example. ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") TabControl 中的標頭屬性的不同型別TabControl with different types in the Header property 下列範例會建立兩個物件，指定的外觀和的。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . summary.span: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串會指定在 屬性顯示為字串的情況下，如何格式化這個屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 複合字串，指定在 屬性顯示為字串的情況下，如何格式化這個屬性。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或屬性、屬性會被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合的`Student`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`類別具有`Name`屬性、 集合`Course`物件，並實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生課程。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 此範例會使用將學生的名稱放入每個(繼承自)，而要顯示的內容中的每一位學生課程清單。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下列範例會實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生課程。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]
